migrations.description: Updates release version config based on the breaking changes in Nx v22
migrations.name: 22-0-0-release-version-config-changes

migrations.description: Consolidates releaseTag* options into nested releaseTag object structure
migrations.name: 22-0-0-consolidate-release-tag-config

migrations.description: Remove the deprecated `external` and `externalBuildTargets` options from the `@nx/js:swc` and `@nx/js:tsc` executors.
migrations.name: remove-external-options-from-js-executors

migrations.description: Removes redundant TypeScript project references from project's tsconfig.json files when runtime tsconfig files (e.g., tsconfig.lib.json, tsconfig.app.json) exist.
migrations.name: remove-redundant-ts-project-references

migrations.description: Create AI Instructions to help migrate users workspaces past breaking changes for Vitest 4.
migrations.name: update-22-2-0

migrations.description: Migrate Vitest usage from @nx/vite to @nx/vitest package.
migrations.name: migrate-vitest-to-vitest-package

migrations.description: Update workspace to use Storybook v10
migrations.name: update-22-1-0-migrate-storybook-v10

migrations.description: Convert jest.config.ts files from ESM to CJS syntax (export default -> module.exports, import -> require) for projects using CommonJS resolution to ensure correct loading under Node.js type-stripping.
migrations.name: convert-jest-config-to-cjs

migrations.description: Renames `cy.exec().its('code')` usages to the new `exitCode` property introduced in Cypress v15.
migrations.name: rename-cy-exec-code-property

migrations.description: Updates the deprecated `Cypress.SelectorPlayground` API to `Cypress.ElementSelector` and removes the unsupported `onElement` option.
migrations.name: update-selector-playground-api

migrations.description: For Angular component testing projects below v18, switches to the fallback `@cypress/angular` harness required by Cypress v15.
migrations.name: update-angular-component-testing-support
